document_data.name: Araneth Idogyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Araneth Idogyr''' was a [[half-elf|half-elven]] former adventurer if the [[Idogyr]] clan, who later ran the [[Hills' Cheer Distillery & Brewery]] in the [[Shalanar|Shalanar Barony]] of [[Erlkazar]]. He was the half-brother of the famous [[Tethyr]]ian mage [[Gamalon Idogyr]].
document_data.Activities: Araneth's claim to fame was his brewing of the popular brew, [[Old One Eye]]. He acquired the recipe for this unique ale from a [[cyclops]] he met and befriended during his time in the [[Goblin Wars (1358 DR)|Goblin Wars]] of [[1358 DR]].
